block.p: SHANLER-Nellie. Age 90, of Hollywood, FL, formerly of Hewlett Harbor, NY, on September 2, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Irving. Loving mother of Robert, David & Judith (Randy) Bergen. Cherished grandmother of Marc and Elizabeth. Adored great-grandmother of five. Memorial service at Cedar Park Cemetery, Oradell, NJ, 1 PM, Tuesday, September 5. We will miss your love and guidance.
